verses.text: Ix yalanxi vinhaj Eliú chi' icha tik:
Ha ticnaic ak' nivank'olal, yujto ol ach in k'ayb'ej, ayto tas ol val yuj swach'iloc Dios.
Ol vak'lab'ej jantac in jelanil yic tzin ch'oxaneli to ha Dios chi' b'ojinac onh, tojol ton paxi.
Ojtaquejeli to a tas sval tik t'ayach manh esoc. Ha in tzin lolon ed' tik, tz'acan in jelanil.
Ha Dios te ay spoder, te ay pax sjelanil, palta malaj junok mach spatiquejeli.
Ha eb' chuk sk'ulej, scham eb' yuj Dios chi', haxo eb' tz'ixtaji, sb'oji yaj eb' yuj.
Ha stanhvan eb' anima wach' sb'eyb'al. Ha tz'ak'anoch eb' yajalil yic sb'inaj eb' t'a masanil tiempo.
Axo eb' sk'ulan chukal, tato stzek'chaj eb' t'a q'uen cadena, syab' val syail eb'.
Ha Dios sch'oxani b'ajtac tz'och smul eb' chi' yujto tzek' eb' t'a yib'anh.
Sloloni yic scachan eb', syalani to syactejcan schucal eb' chi'.
Tato scha yab' eb', syak'anoch sb'a eb' t'a yol sk'ab', tzalajk'olal tzek' eb', ato syal jantac sq'uinal eb' syak'a'.
Palta tato max scha yab' eb' jun, xicjicham eb', sb'atcan eb' t'a skal eb' chamnac yujto maj yak'och eb' t'a sk'ool tas syal Dios.
Ha eb' malaj yelk'och Dios t'ay, aynhejcot yoval eb'. Wach'chom tz'ak'jioch syaelal eb' yuj, palta max yal-laj sb'a eb' t'ay yic sk'anan scolval eb' t'a yib'anh.
Spet cham eb', q'uixvelal tz'aj satel eb'.
Ha t'a skal syaelal junok mach, ha Dios tz'ak'an nachajel smul, yic scolchaj t'a skal syaelal chi'.

Mamin Job, icha chi' sgana Dios tzach yutej. Tzach yik'anelta t'a skal a yaelal, tzach yik'anb'at t'a jun lugar te wach' b'aj manhxa tas syak' palta t'ayach, yic tzak' tzalajb'oc a k'ool t'a vael jantac swach'il.
Palta haxo ticnaic, ha Dios tzach ch'olb'itani, a yaelal smoj schaan eb' chuk, a chi' van a chaani.
Yuj chi' ya'ilej a b'a yic wach' manh elanhchameloc tzach satel yuj yoval sk'ol Dios. Manh ol yal a colchaj t'a yoval sk'ol chi' yuj jantacoc tumin.
Malaj yelk'och a b'eyumal t'a sat. Malaj pax yelk'och jantac ipalil t'ay.
Mocab' a nib'ejcot sq'uik'alq'uinalil chamel t'a ib'anh, aton stiempoal satjiel nivac chonhab' t'a elanhchamel.
Ya'ilej a b'a yic max a nib'ejb'at a b'ha t'a chukal, yujto a yaelal tik ix javi t'a ib'anh yic max ach b'at t'a chukal chi'.
Scham val ilan jantac spoder Dios. Malaj junok k'ayb'um syal slajb'an sb'a yet'oc.
Malaj junok mach syal yalan tas sk'ulej, malaj mach syal yalanoch t'a sat to chuk ix sk'ulej.
Masanil anima tz'alan wach' lolonel yuj tas wach' ix sb'o Dios chi'. Ya'ilej pax a b'a yic max b'at satk'olal alan wach' lolonel t'ay.
Masanil anima tz'ilan tastac b'ob'il yuj, wach'chom najatnhej syilb'at eb'.
Maxtzac nachajel cuuj jantac snivanil yelk'ochi, max yal co b'isan jantac yab'ilal.
Ha tz'ik'anq'ue jantac ha ha' t'a chaanh, smeltzajoch ha' nhab'il.
Smolan sb'ha ha' t'a skal asun, slajvi chi' yax nhab' tz'aj yem ha' t'a quib'anh.
Malaj mach snachajel yuj tas tz'aj spucaxb'at asun chi' yuj, ma tas yuj sk'anh k'u t'a satcha’anh b'aj ay scajnub'.
Ha tz'ak'anek' copoljoc leb'lon t'a spatictac b'aj ayeq'ui, palta a yich ha' mar, anheja' k'ik'q'uinal yilji.
Icha tik tz'aj sch'olb'itan juntzanh chonhab', syak'an jantac vael t'a eb' anima.
Ha yamjinac leb'lon, syumanb'at b'aj syal sk'ool, d'inhannhej sk'och b'aj sk'och chi'.
Ayic sk'anh k'u chi' a sch'oxani to van scot nivac ik'nhab', inatax nok' molb'etzal nok', yojtac nok' to vanxo scot ik'nhab' chi'.
